Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Mysterium and federation strategists continue to press for access to the areas beneath the Temple of Sikander.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:57#6#lurking storm lizards} to clear the way.

Report to Emya in Dragonfall when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
